plot: From HIV to hairdos, a group of Zambian teenagers let us in on life in A Village. Snapshots of a Village is both an intimate and an upbeat documentary introducing Kangwa, Florence, Emmanuel...
title: Snapshots of a Village
plot_es: From HIV to hairdos, a group of Zambian teenagers let us in on life in A Village. Snapshots of a Village is both an intimate and an upbeat documentary introducing Kangwa, Florence, Emmanuel...
